argument.name: date
argument.description: A variable containing a date value or a character string containing a legitimate representation of a date value ( ISDATE (Date_Value) = .T.).

page.description: Returns a formatted character string in the 'Month DD, YYYY' format.
page.discussion: MDY() returns a Formatted_Date in the "Month DD, YYYY" format for the specified Date_Value.
page.example: mdy({12-18-95}) -> "December 18, 1995" mdy(BIRTHDAY) -> "November 25, 1995", assuming BIRTHDAY contains 11-25-95 mdy(date() )-> Current system date
